name: psydapt
description: Bindings for the C++ psydapt library.

scripts.build_individual: rm -rf build && emcmake cmake -S . -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release $FLAGS && npm run buildpt2
scripts.build_all: npm run build && npm run build_staircase && npm run build_qp_weibull && npm run build_qp_normcdf && npm run build_qp_csf
scripts.buildpt2: cd build && emmake make && cd .. && cp build/psydapt*.js dist/
scripts.bundle_all: for i in ./dist/*-es6.js; do webpack --env=input=$(basename $i); done
scripts.build_bundle: npm run build && npm run bundle
scripts.build_bundle_all: npm run build_all && npm run bundle_all

author: Alexander Forrence
